entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.4°C

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
